results.description: Mauro Icardi scores late winner helping Paris St-Germain return to winning ways in Ligue 1 with victory away to Brest.

results.title: Brest 1-2 Paris Saint Germain: Mauro Icardi scores late winner for PSG

results.description: PSG sporting director Leonardo criticises comments by Real Madrid boss Zinedine Zidane about the club's striker Kylian Mbappe.
results.shortTitle: Zidane's Mbappe comments annoy PSG chief
results.title: Kylian Mbappe: Real Madrid boss Zidane upsets PSG chief Leonardo with 'dream move' comments

results.description: Paris St-Germain book their place in the last 16 of the Champions League with a narrow victory over Club Bruges in Group A.
results.shortTitle: PSG maintain perfect start to progress
results.title: Paris St-Germain 1-0 Club Bruges: French champions maintain perfect start to qualify

results.description: Paris St-Germain slump to a third Ligue 1 defeat of the season as bottom side Dijon come from behind to stun the French champions.
results.shortTitle: Bottom side Dijon stun leaders PSG
results.title: Dijon 2-1 Paris Saint Germain: French champions slump to shock defeat against bottom side

results.description: Barcelona's players offered to accept delays to their pay if it would help the club re-sign forward Neymar in the summer, says Gerard Pique.
results.shortTitle: Barca players wanted to help Neymar deal
results.title: Neymar: Barcelona players 'were willing to delay pay' to help re-sign Brazil star

results.description: Italy midfielder Marco Verratti signs a three-year contract extension that will keep him at Paris St-Germain until 2024.
results.title: Paris St-Germain: Marco Verratti signs contract extension until 2024

results.description: Paris St-Germain take advantage of Nantes' defeat against Monaco on Friday by thrashing Marseille to move eight points clear at the top of Ligue 1.

results.title: PSG 4-0 Marseille: Kylian Mbappe and Mauro Icardi on target for hosts

results.description: Kylian Mbappe scores a second-half hat-trick as Paris St-Germain defeated Club Bruges 5-0 to take a big step towards the Champions League knockout stage.

results.title: Club Bruges 0-5 Paris St-Germain: Kylian Mbappe dazzles with second-half hat-trick

results.title: Nice 1-4 Paris St-Germain: Angel di Maria scores twice for PSG

results.description: Paris Saint Germain forward Neymar limps off as Brazil are held to a 1-1 draw by Nigeria in Singapore.

results.description: Paris St-Germain forward Neymar wins his 100th cap as Brazil draw 1-1 with Senegal in Singapore.

results.description: Neymar scores the only goal as Paris St-Germain recover from a midweek defeat against Reims by beating Bordeaux in Ligue 1.

results.description: French champions Paris St-Germain lose at home in the league for the first time since May 2018 as they are beaten 2-0 by Reims.

results.description: Neymar scores a late winner as French champions Paris St-Germain edge past Lyon to move three points clear at the top of Ligue 1.

results.description: Barcelona "did everything possible" to try and sign Neymar this summer but think his club Paris Saint-Germain "never wanted to sell him," according to the Catalan club's chief executive.
